{"news": [{"headline" : "Government Considers Outsourcing Surveillance Data Management to Private Firm", 
"img" : "/imgs/S9500/Reichstag Berlin.png", 
"text": "As the government struggles to manage the massive volume of data generated by expanded surveillance measures, officials are considering outsourcing data analysis and storage to a private firm. Overwhelmed by the sheer amount of information, the government believes a private company could handle the task more efficiently. However, growing public concern and numerous petitions are prompting discussions about shortening the amount of time the data is stored. The outcome remains uncertain as officials seek a balance between security and civil liberties."}],
"nextState": 9601}
